game.name: Scribble Bots
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, 음량 개별 조정, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Draw your robot, play as your drawing! Face your friends in Scribble Bots, a 2D, physics based sandbox party game. Will your robot be a mechanical masterpiece, or a dysfunctional abomination?
